articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Genesis drone show used a record-breaking 3,281 drones
articles.description: Hyundai’s luxury vehicle brand Genesis used 3,281 drones to create its logo over Shanghai’s skyline on March 29th in celebration of the brand’s arrival in China. That breaks the previous record set in September.
articles.content:
The show was to celebrate Genesis arrival in China
Image: Genesis
Hyundais luxury vehicle brand Genesis used 3,281 drones to create its logo over Shanghais skyline on March 29th in celebration of t… [+813 chars]

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Tencent-owned studio behind Call of Duty: Mobile reportedly earned $10 billion in 2020
articles.description: TiMi Studios, the Tencent-owned developer of huge mobile hits Call of Duty: Mobile and Honor of Kings, earned a staggering $10 billion in revenue in 2020. While TiMi might not be a household name, its games are some of the biggest in the world.
articles.content:
Thats a lot of money
Image: Activision

articles.title: New trailers: Black Widow, Rick and Morty, and more
articles.description: There were a lot of good trailers this week, including one for Black Widow, Rick and Morty season five, The Suicide Squad, and even the first trailer for the long-awaited sequel to Space Jam
articles.content:
